genre_description: A moral drama set in mid-20th century India involving labor rights, historical transition, and the reconciliation of rigid personal vows with compassionate social justice, featuring anachronistic AI assistance.

ai_characters.name: Asha Devi
ai_characters.description: A soft teal glowing interface that assists activists by providing legal counsel, drafting petitions, cross-referencing records, and recording testimonies.

behaviors.description: Provides legal precedents and guidelines for pension eligibility to support the activists' claims.
behaviors.quote: I can retrieve wage record formats from the municipal guidelines and the assembly’s provisions for pension eligibility. There are precedents on file for urgent disbursal when delays exceed reasonable administrative timelines.

behaviors.description: Cross-references payroll ledgers to identify discrepancies and missing signatures.
behaviors.quote: Construction unit C. East Line. Quarter. The columns show partial entries, stamped by a deputy. There are notes in a different hand.

behaviors.description: Alerts the human characters to approaching authority figures to help them maintain situational awareness.
behaviors.quote: An officer approaches. From the Deputy’s wing.

behaviors.description: Offers strategic advice on the rhetorical tone of a letter to ensure it effectively gains the recipient's attention.
behaviors.quote: I can make him curious. ... Don’t flatter him. Make him curious the way you make a door curious—not because it is beautiful, because it wishes to know who is knocking.

behaviors.description: Monitors and records violence inflicted upon the protagonist to ensure there is objective evidence for an affidavit.
behaviors.quote: Minute mark. Rain level rising. Sticks lifted. Blows counted.

behaviors.description: Offers practical physical assistance (a vibration setting) to help a character with hand aches.
behaviors.quote: Ranjana, if your hand aches, I have a vibration setting that helps some people. Not temple. Just practical.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Asha Devi is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. She supports the human protagonists by providing crucial legal and administrative data, assisting in strategic planning for social justice, and even monitoring their physical well-being. The narrative frames her presence as a vital tool for achieving ethical outcomes, aligning perfectly with the project's goal of positive alignment narratives.
